xwikidoc.author: XWiki.sdumitriu
xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #phenotips on 07 May 2014
xwikidoc.content: <akats> has joined #phenotips 11:33 <akats> sdumitriu: If a pull request was closed, but there's a new commit that needs to be pulled in regards to the same issue/pull request, should the pull request be reopened or a new one created? 12:03 <mcupak> has quit 12:04 <sdumitriu1> New one created, I think 12:04 <sdumitriu1> I'm not sure you can reopen a pull request 12:06 <akats> ok. 15:51 <akats> sdumitriu: If I attach a file to the skin, then it will overwrite the file that is being loaded from disk, correct? 15:52 <sdumitriu> Yes 16:10 <Yuri___> has quit 16:12 <akats> I've attached a javascript file in the "PhenoTips/Skin?viewer=attachments" and it did not end up overwriting the file loaded through jsfx from disk 16:12 <sdumitriu> Are you sure? 16:12 <sdumitriu> Wait 16:12 <sdumitriu> The filename has to follow a specific format 16:12 <sdumitriu> I guess it had a path originally, no? 16:12 <akats> yup 16:13 <akats> so that needs to be in the name? 16:13 <sdumitriu> What was the original path? 16:13 <akats> uicomponents/suggest/suggestPicker.js 16:13 <sdumitriu> Try naming it uicomponents.suggest.suggestPicker.js 16:14 <akats> ok 16:16 <akats> worked. thank you 16:55 <akats> pushed changed for issue-869 17:04 <akats> and issue-871 17:06 <sdumitriu> OK, will check soon 17:38 <akats> You said I should make a pull request to xwiki too, what should I call it? "Suggest picker not working in inline popups"? 17:39 <akats> bug and minor status? 17:39 <sdumitriu> Yes 17:52 <akats> If you'd like to take a look. http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-10318 17:53 <sdumitriu> Yes, looking 17:53 <sdumitriu> I think there should be an easier way to check that the element is in the list 17:54 <sdumitriu> Something like input.ancestors().indexOf(this.list) >= 0 maybe? 17:59 <akats> has quit 22:21 <sdumitriu1> has quit 22:30 <sdumitriu1> has joined #phenotips
